ca.riskgamet31.controllers

Interface MainDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameMainDriver, TournamentMainDriver

    public interface MainDriver
    an abstraction for main game driver for the execution of game. Loading map, creating players and distribution of countries and armies happens here.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fareed Tayr

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> phaseInfo
      phase info data structure to be passed to phase view observer

    • Method Detail

      • getFileInput

        java.lang.String getFileInput(MainDriver GM)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gives different options to create a gamemap and returns the file path of the chosen XML file
        Parameters:
        GM - main driver of the game
        Returns:
        xmlFilePath map xml file path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • createGameMap

        default ca.riskgamet31.maincomps.GameMap createGameMap(java.lang.String xmlpath)
                                                throws ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidGraphException,
                                                       ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidNameException,
                                                       ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidCountryException,
                                                       ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidContinentException,
                                                       ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidLinkException,
                                                       java.lang.Exception
        Creates the game map from the CreateMap Class for the player.
        Parameters:
        xmlpath - XML file path
        Returns:
        Game map object
        Throws:
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidGraphException - If the graph is invalid
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidNameException - If the name of continent or country has special characters or numbers
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidCountryException - If there is a duplicate country
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidContinentException - If there is a duplicate continent.
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidLinkException - If from and to countries are same.
        java.lang.Exception - For handling null values and XML malformed exceptions.

      • createPlayer

        void createPlayer()
           throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                  ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidNameException
        Creates players for the game after checking pre-conditions. A player name cannot have special characters and duplication is not allowed.
        Throws:
        ca.riskgamet31.exceptions.InvalidNameException - InvalidNameException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - NullPointerException

      • setUpGame

        void setUpGame()
        sets up the game by calling the distributeCountries which randomly distributes countries among players. Once the countries are distributed, armies are distributed among countries the player own.

      • updatePhaseInfo

        default void updatePhaseInfo(java.lang.String phaseName,
                             java.lang.String playerName,
                             java.lang.String phaseActionInfo)
        to update current phase information
        Parameters:
        phaseName - current phase name
        playerName - current player name
        phaseActionInfo - current phase general actions

      • playGame

        java.lang.String playGame()
        a method representing each turn
        Returns:
        name of winner.

      • execute

        void execute()
        main method of the game
